website_summaries.verdict: A simple, modern bookcase that offers plenty of space for books, antiques, knick-knacks, and much more.
pros: Round-end tiers ensure the bookcase will fit beautifully in the corner of any room
Each tier can support up to 22 pounds
Can be placed vertically or horizontally in a living space
cons: Does not include pieces to cover the bookcase's screws
Sometimes can be difficult to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged, but overall it is a decent decorative shelf.  Wouldn't use for heavy usage.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived damaged but I was in a rush to get it set up for guests arriving so I didn't want to return it and wait for another one. Putting it together was easy with two people and took about 20 minutes. The shelf looks nice but we needed to put styrofoam under it to make it stand straight. I wouldn't use it for heavy usage as it seems like the finish would chip off. I am using mine for decorative items only. When we were putting it together, some of the finish was flaking off.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmicethos

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice shelf. A little larger than I thought it was going to be but I love it!!! It was very easy to put together. I am a 52 year old woman and I put it together all by myself in about 30 minutes. If I need another corner shelf I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Duan Marie Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to assemble and looks great in my corner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Droberts0724

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very good shelf . Extremely easy to put together. Fits perfectly in the corner, allows me to display my crystal collection without being in the way. If I had another vacant corner I would buy another one. 4 stars because there were some minor scratches in obvious places.
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Good but corner was cracked. I contacted customer service in the immediately helped fix the issue with a price reduction amazing customer service
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Cover Ups
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, quality product. Only reason it wasn't a 5 is a simple design flaw. This shelf ships without any cover up for the bolts that hold in each shelf. The bolt heads are not seen as they are located in corner unseen but they scratch the way and are aesthetically displeasing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lathrop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I put this together with a drill in about a half hour. The holes matched up, so pretty easy. I got this for a guest room to sit the cable box below the mounted tv. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Got more than I bargained for
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive piece of furniture is a sleeper. It looks so elegant and was sooooo easy to make. It took about 30 minutes to build. I would highly recommend this elegant piece of furniture!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: It's a Bookshelf!
customer_reviews.text: As assemble-it-yourself furniture goes, this is just fine. Assembly was easy, requiring only a screwdriver and a hammer. The assembled shelf is sturdy enough, and it provides the additional storage we needed. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: brhubart

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought some bookcases from walmart and their "wood" is weak and light. This one you can feel the difference instantly. Was easy and straight forward to build. I built two within an hour. They look lovely in their corners. Wished they had more color options.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.  Easy Assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good looking with durable quality. I bought two. One one issue...the instructions sheet had an error that put the wall anchor on the inside of the cabinet. Also, the instructions did not acknowledge and tell you to remove the corner protectors prior to assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. easy to install and looks good. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edetubbs

customer_reviews.title: Stable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these corner bookcases. Fit perfect in my small den. They are stable and sturdy. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Corner stand must buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Sturdy and fits In corner perfect. Very easy assembly I don't regret buying this at all
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: size was the most important
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my corner in the hallway and was able to put so many books on the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Miletics

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nursery addition
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this. We have a smaller nursery and I was looking for a great space saver. This was it! It fits perfectly in the corner of our new baby boys nursery and is so convenient for holding everything a mommy needs. I also love the safety feature that connects the product to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh Forsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Fits perfect in my office and saves some space. Have gotten several compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted. Put it together in 15 min.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, heavy and sturdy. Goes beautifully in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't new. Arrived in a shipping box had been ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't new. Arrived in a shipping box had been scratched and a marker used to cover the scratch. Didnt discover until box was thrown away. Too much of a hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: C S G

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, exactly what we were looking for. 0 blemishes, no problems shipping.
customer_reviews.author: dgriffi2

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price. Works perfectly in our small nursery to hold toys and books.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Great corner shelving unit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelving unit! Love, love, love it! It’s not wood, more like a wood type plastic that looks like wood. It’s a dark, dark brown... Sturdy. Lots of room.. fills those awkward corners
customer_reviews.author: D.L.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great corner shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Easy to assemble. Works great for our corner.
customer_reviews.author: SSR

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and it was shipped to me quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Gean

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Easy to put together. We'll packed. Even came with an earthquake strap.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Bryant

customer_reviews.title: It looks really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks in my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for what I needed to be placed, sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jonie Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Easy to assemble and looks great in our daughters room.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cool!!!!! Very special for small corner, I LOVE THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ALEXANDRA

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Very good quality piece, easy assembly and perfect fit in a variety of settings, at home as well as the office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would’ve read the measurements better because it is ridiculously small. It makes the corner I wanted to put it in look awkward. It also didn’t come with pieces to cover the screws which is really annoying. It’s true to color, a very nice espresso color. It was also very quick and easy to put together. Overall, it’s a good purchase if you have a smaller space you need to fill, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice, high quality shelf for the price. Holds more than I thought it would. Easy to assemble. Took me about 15 minutes with a manual screwdriver. Looks and feels like a much more expensive shelf. Will likely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Stylish storage
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf! It can be used vertically or horizontally which is a bonus for people with multiple storage needs. It’s nice and tall the shelves are perfect for small books and things. Not great for tall items but very stylish in the corner of the room
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Michelle Holmes

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and was packed very well
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet assembled the book shelf but have taken it out of the box. It is sturdy and was packed very well. Although the box had a tear the packing protected the book shelf. I anticipate this will go together fine and be just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Latte girl

customer_reviews.title: I really like this shelf
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shelf. I bought it for my daughter’s nursery to display some collectible items. I would’ve given it five stars, but as I was putting it together, I put the one panel on wrong because the directions weren’t clear, so I had to unscrew the panel and flip it. Overall though, it wasn’t time consuming and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Pecha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a corner - a sturdy, easy to assemble, high quality, attractive and delightful corner bookcase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, all pieces supplied and in good shape, and a delightful addition to my front room. I can never get enough bookcases and this is perfect for what I wanted. The price is reasonable, and the quality is excellent. Sturdy and well designed. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Booklover in AZ

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was easy to assemble and looks great. It’s heavy and sturdy. It was slightly damaged on 3 corners, but that was hidden when the shelf was assembled. I contacted the company and was impressed by their immediate and gracious response. I’m very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wrkinprgrss

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and it looks amazing under my mounted tv
customer_reviews.text: It was much more then I expected. It is very sturdy and it looks amazing under my mounted tv. It looks like I paid a lot more then I did. Assembly was very easy and the instructions were very easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shelf fits perfectly for my needs Seems to be sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Hi TeK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Corner Shelf
customer_reviews.text: This shelf worked out perfect for our sons nursery! Although it was a bit tricky to put together, the shelf seems very strong and fits perfectly in the corner of his room.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Petrilla

customer_reviews.title: Love this bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: The bookcase looks amazing in my man-cave! Plenty of space on it, too. It's definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to assemble and fits perfectly in the corner of my room! It's a great size - not too small, not too big. Solid piece.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy and finished product looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bookshelf. Assembly was easy and finished product looks great. Really like the strap to attach to the wall. Won't topple over even when full of books.
customer_reviews.author: peggybeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and hides my cables up to the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Danwilk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful and exactly what we needed. And so easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice sturdy shelf and was super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sturdy shelf and was super easy to assemble. One thing I would change are the black corners peices at top and bottom of both sides. These should match the color of the unit itself. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jap2367

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute addition to my living room! I get a lot of compliments on it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product, easy to put together. Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Cedarg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in bedroom for a small TV!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for the corner of our bedroom that I could put a small DVR box & TV on top and this fits the bill perfectly! Easy to put together, sturdy and looks nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

product_meta.title: LANGRIA 5-Tier Corner Shelf Bookcase Multipurpose Freestanding Modular Shelving, Round End Shelves, Sturdy MDF Construction, Home Office Use, 15.6” x 15.6” x 47.2”, Black Walnut
feature_bullets: SIMPLE AND MODERN: with round end tiers, this corner bookcase for wall fits almost any corner and adds style and tidiness to your home and office; available in a white color to form a storage set
SPACIOUS STORAGE: the 5 tiers bookshelf provides plenty of space for storing and organizing cosmetics, magazines and other objects; use it vertically or horizontally for your preference
MADE TO LAST: this bookcase is constructed of high quality MDF and sturdy enough to support 22 lbs. per each tier; just wipe it clean with a damp cloth if it’s dirty
SAFE TO USE: nail protection pads at the bottom prevent floor from scratch; a hardware pack is provided in the package in case you need to secure this unit to the wall for extra safety
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: assembly required; the instruction is included in the package for your reference

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
